I love this class. This could be the most effective class I ever take due to the way prof. teach and the activity in class encourage all student to participate. Also the environment and my classmates were very active.
From my perspective, I supposed that the class has already given me interactive and fun environment. However, preparing more activities such as Kahoot or acting game would be more fun!

Thanks you professor to makes this class so  good! In this class I don't need to worry about the grade and the thing what I can learn. Because I know that every classtime is full of new thought and I don't need to be pressure on everything!

I would say that this didn't seem to be a 'normal' class, not as the other classes. What I really liked that it is not a stressful class, it's the opposite, it's a stress relieving class, and there was no way of keeping track of grades

It's so much more than just design thinking, including life lessons and soft skills that'll definitely come in handy in your life. Every professor should take this course (to learn how to teach). Seize the chance when Smithy's still here!!
Really love this class! Learning and inspired a lot from professor’s presentation as well as the interaction between classmates. Hoping that I can take another professor’s class next semester.
雖然小組project可能負擔有點大，但我覺得是一門讓我有收穫的課
